price: “Yaa Gooftaa keenya! Nuti waan Ati buuftetti amanneerra. Ergamicha (Iisaas) hordofne; kanaafuu warra [Rabbiin malee Gooftaan biraa akka hin jirre] ragaa ba’an wajjin nu barreessi” [jedhan].
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
